#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{   int test,n;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    unsigned long long int x;
    while(test--)
    {x=0;
    	
    	scanf("%d",&n);
    	x=4*pow(n,3.0);
    	x+=6*pow(n,2.0)*(n-1);
    	printf("%llu\n",x);
    	
    }
	return 0;
	
}
